name: Encode ReceiptHandle
Parse DEX
Set SQS Query Attributes

rules.to: payload.[costcutterAccountNumber, storeName, storeAddress, storePostcode, storeContactName, storeContactNumber, bdmName, bdmEmail, branding, floorstandingQuantity, tabletopQuantity, solutionType, solutionQuantity, shippingChargesAcknowledge]

name: Add time to Payload
Set Bearer Token
Set rejectUnauthorized
func:
msg.rejectUnauthorized = false; 

return msg;

name: Get Yesterday's sale from Critica
info: https://critica.promate.com/odata/ODataFilters/{{{real_timezone_minus10mins}}}_{{{real_timezone}}}?$orderby=TxTime

name: Generate Back-up messages
func:
msg.MessageBody=msg.payload.Body;
return msg;

name: Build http request
Check flag status
info: Check the new flag status

name: Build http request
Build http request
Encode Email
Build http request
Build http request
info:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.sendinblue.com/v3/smtp/email \
  --header 'accept: application/json' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"sender":{"name":"eP Robot","email":"robot@expressoplus.com"},"to":[{"email":"Alex","name":"alex.perjescu@expressoplus.com"}],"replyTo":{"email":"transactional@expressoplus.com"},"attachment":[{"url":"http://urlofattacment.com"}],"textContent":"this is the body of the email","subject":"this is the subject line"}'
return msg;
